Subject: Vehement's Reaction
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Unknown sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...

Vehement/Sun Crusher/Reflector:





Vehement received Dark One's transmission, but didn't reply.  He didn't know 
how too.  He then received Dragonfly's transmission, and acted his comm. 
unit, sending a reply to Dragonfly.

"Vehement hear, leader of the base.  I can't talk right now, a battle is 
about to start." 

The Brotherhood leader began taking steps backward towards the access hatch 
of his base, fingers working over his forearm computer, Sun Crusher and 
Reflector soon alerted of the situation brewing.
